description: The "synthetic.products" table in the "synthetic_250_postgres" database represents product information within a business context, detailing attributes such as SKU, product names, descriptions, pricing, dimensions, and metadata. Each product is uniquely identified by a "product_id," serves different brands and categories as indicated by the "brand_id" and "category_id," but lacks explicit foreign key relationships according to the provided data. This table serves as a central repository for product data, potentially used for inventory management, catalog listings, and facilitating e-commerce operations.

columns.name: product_id
columns.description: This column represents a unique identifier assigned sequentially to each product in the catalog, ensuring distinct product recognition within the system.

columns.name: sku
columns.description: Purpose unclear from available data.

columns.name: product_name
columns.description: This column likely contains varied narrative or descriptive entries, possibly representing unique characteristics or summaries related to different products. The exact purpose and context within the business are unclear from the available data.

columns.name: slug
columns.description: This field contains a URL-friendly representation of the product name, composed of lowercase words separated by hyphens. It facilitates search engine optimization and improves readability for product identification on the web.

columns.name: brand_id
columns.description: This column likely represents an identification number uniquely associated with different brands for products. The purpose of assigning these specific numerical identifiers is unclear from the available data.

columns.name: category_id
columns.description: This column identifies the particular category to which each product belongs, with each integer representing a distinct category. Purpose unclear from available data.

columns.name: short_description
columns.description: This column contains brief textual summaries or blurbs associated with products, capturing general concepts or themes related to the product. The content is varied and does not adhere to a strict format or context.

columns.name: long_description
columns.description: This column contains extended descriptive text that elaborates on the synthetic products, often using abstract or metaphorical language. Purpose unclear from available data due to the lack of coherent context in sample values.

columns.name: base_price
columns.description: This column represents the monetary amount set as a standard price for products before any discounts or taxes are applied. The values indicate varied pricing levels, suggesting a diverse range of product costs.

columns.name: sale_price
columns.description: This column likely represents the selling price of different products in a currency unit, as indicated by the high values. Purpose unclear from available data.

columns.name: cost_price
columns.description: This column represents the price at which products are purchased by the business. It reflects the base financial expenditure per unit before any additional costs or markups are applied.

columns.name: weight_kg
columns.description: This column represents the weight of a product in kilograms. It tracks the mass of various products, with sample values indicating a range between approximately 8 and 96 kilograms.

columns.name: dimensions_cm
columns.description: Purpose unclear from available data.

columns.name: is_active
columns.description: Indicates whether a product is currently available for sale or use. A value of true suggests the product is active, whereas false indicates it is inactive.

columns.name: is_featured
columns.description: Indicates whether a product is prominently highlighted or given special attention, with the default status being not highlighted.

columns.name: is_digital
columns.description: Indicates whether a product is a digital item, with the option to be unspecified. The default assumption is that products are not digital unless stated otherwise.

columns.name: tax_class
columns.description: Purpose unclear from available data.

columns.name: meta_title
columns.description: Purpose unclear from available data. The column seems to contain brief and abstract text phrases that do not provide a clear business context.

columns.name: meta_description
columns.description: This column contains freeform text descriptions that offer additional information or context about the products, possibly aiming to enhance marketing or listing details. The contents appear to include descriptive or narrative text related to various aspects or features of the products.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: This column records the date and time when a product record was created. It defaults to the current timestamp at the time of entry.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: This column records the date and time when a product's record was last updated. The stored timestamps suggest updates frequently occur without timezone distinction.

indexes.index_definition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX products_pkey ON synthetic.products USING btree (product_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX products_sku_key ON synthetic.products USING btree (sku)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX products_slug_key ON synthetic.products USING btree (slug)
